text:
the windows installer contains some .svn directories:

C:\apache-lenya-1.2.1\legal\.svn
C:\apache-lenya-1.2.1\tools\.svn
C:\apache-lenya-1.2.1\tools\bin\.svn
C:\apache-lenya-1.2.1\tools\jetty\.svn
C:\apache-lenya-1.2.1\tools\lib\.svn
C:\apache-lenya-1.2.1\tools\loader\.svn
creator: roku@apache.org

text: i added a note to the release howto to prevent that in the future.
